author: Keith Smith
text: I am looking for performance measures for municipal internal audit departments.  Some examples I have found so far include % of audit recommendations implemented, audit hours incurred vs. hours budgeted, and cycle time for issuing draft audit reports.  I would appreacite any feedback with specific performance measures you may be using.
title: Internal Audit Performance Measurements
